name: Pizza Parlor
description:
Pizza Parlor is a console/text based game where you are put in charge of a, well, pizza parlor. 

It runs in the command window, and is Windows OS only. 

To play, download and unzip the folder and click the "PizzaParlor" application. 

Near future plans:

  • Save files
  • Fix typos and misspelled words (mozzerella should be mozzarella...) 
  • Tweak customer sensitivity. The starting recipe is so rubbish that the parlor loses all its customers after the first day.
  • Get rid of the confirmation for starting the day.

Future plans:

  • A proper installation file would be nice. Currently both Chrome and Windows think my game is malware or something worse... probably because it runs in the command prompt., which brings me to my next bullet...
  • Running in an application window, not the command line.
